duties_responsibilities.duty: Originate and structure mortgage loans for clients across multiple markets.
Adopt and leverage a unique compensation structure to build and maintain a client portfolio for long-term residual income.
Utilize a paperless platform and digital mortgage experience to streamline operations and provide efficient customer service.
Make independent decisions, backed by support from an experienced broker/banker, to ensure superb customer service and unlimited processing capability.
Tele-commute and operate business entirely online with the option of W2 or 1099 compensation.

education_certification.credential: Currently licensed in at least 11 states
